quotes: Cameron described himself in December 2005 as a 'modern compassionate conservative'
In his first Conservative conference speech as party leader in Bournemouth in 2006, he described the National Health Service as 'one of the 20th Century's greatest achievements'
With Barack Obama and then German chancellor Angela Merkel at Deauville, France, May 2011, Cameron said that he believed in 'spreading freedom and democracy, and supporting humanitarian intervention'
